problems.title: Reverse Bits
problems.description: Reverse the bits of a 32-bit unsigned integer.
problems.outputFormat: Print the number with reversed bits

problems.title: Find Single Number
problems.description: In an array where every element appears twice except one, find that single element using XOR.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size, always odd)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Count Bits to Flip
problems.description: Count the number of bits needed to flip to convert number A to number B.
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers a and b
problems.outputFormat: Print count of bits to flip

problems.title: Position of Rightmost Set Bit
problems.description: Find the position of the rightmost set bit (1-indexed from right).
problems.outputFormat: Print position of rightmost set bit

sampleTestCases.explanation: 18 = 10010, rightmost set bit is at position 2

problems.title: Clear All Bits from MSB to i
problems.description: Clear all bits from the most significant bit through i (inclusive, 0-indexed from right).
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers: n (number) and i (bit position)
problems.outputFormat: Print the number after clearing bits

problems.title: Power of 4 Check
problems.description: Check if a number is a power of 4 using bitwise operations.

problems.title: Next Power of 2
problems.description: Find the next power of 2 greater than or equal to a given number.

problems.title: Binary to Gray Code
problems.description: Convert a binary number to its Gray code equivalent.

problems.title: Gray Code to Binary
problems.description: Convert a Gray code number to its binary equivalent.
problems.inputFormat: Single integer n (Gray code in decimal)

problems.title: Rotate Bits Left
problems.description: Rotate the bits of a number to the left by k positions (considering 8-bit number).
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers: n (number) and k (rotation count)
problems.outputFormat: Print the number after left rotation
